### üïπÔ∏è CONTROLS
<select id="methodSelect" class="brutal-select">
    <option value="">Select an Algorithm</option>
    <option value="breadthfirst">Breadth First Search</option>
    <option value="depthfirst">Depth First Search</option>
</select>

<button id="runMethodButton" class="btn-hero">RUN ALGORITHM</button>
:::

<div id="maze-container" class="brutal-card" style="background: white; text-align: center;">
</div>


<script>
const buttonElement = document.getElementById("runMethodButton");
const selectElement = document.getElementById("methodSelect");

buttonElement.addEventListener("click", () => {
    const algo = selectElement.value; // "breadthfirst" or "depthfirst"
    
    // Map your select values to the 'bfs'/'dfs' expected by maze_maker
    const type = algo === "breadthfirst" ? "bfs" : "dfs";
    
    if(window.draw_maze) {
        window.draw_maze(type);
    } else {
        console.error("draw_maze function not loaded yet!");
    }
});
</script>
